content: sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain 2 space chain 2 miss 2 sts* repeat from * to * twice more treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts in the centre chain 2 space make the following 2 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts * chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the next chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * twice more chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the next chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts in the last stitch make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet and 1 dtr treble_crochet turn 11 repeat row 9 be sure to repeat from * to * 3 more times 12 repeat row 10 be sure to repeat from * to * 3 more times 13 repeat row 9 be sure to repeat from * to * 4 more times 14 repeat row 10 be sure to repeat from * to * 4 more times 15 repeat row 9 be sure to repeat from * to * 5 more times you do not add in any extra repeats unless you specifically want your scarf to be wider if that is the case you can add in another repeat of row 10 and 9 with the additional repeats always end increasing on a row 9 repeat from this next row we will start to make the straight edges of you scarf 16 chain 4 this is your first st miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space chain 2 miss the next 2 sts * treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain 2 space chain 2 miss 2 sts* repeat from * to * 5 more times treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts in the centre chain 2 space make the following 2 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 2 2 treble_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts * chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the next chain 2 space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * 5 more times chain 2 miss the next 2 sts make 2 treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next 2 sts dtr treble_crochet in the top of the chain 4 below turn this is where we simply repeat row 16 until we have our desired length i completed another 104 row the edging along the top is 3 row 1 chain 4 miss the next 3 sts *treble_crochet double_crochet in the chain space chain 3 miss the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts chain 3 miss the next 2 sts* repeat from * to * 6 more times you should now have reach the centre make
